title: Executive Assistant
job_overview:
Hello,
My life is hectic, and I need help managing my projects and personal life. This is no easy task, as the businesses are unique and intense.

Current businesses:
Animation studio 
Merchandise / Toy Company
Online Education business
Consulting

I have so much information flooding in all the time that I occasionally get distracted and miss important details. It doesn't help that I am not very good at checking my email. I am younger (27) and plan to find someone to stay with me for a long while, as the business I run are relatively stable even in the age of AI. 

I need someone who will do the following:
1. Diligently follow up with my teaUpgrade to see actual infombers about progress updates on projects
2. Send customer support emails 
3. Read and filter my emails for important information
4. Help organize my work
5. Help with my to-do list
6. Write promotional emails
